description: RBDVolumeSource represents a Rados Block Device mount that lasts the lifetime of a pod. RBD volumes support ownership management and SELinux relabeling.

CephMonitors.description: Required: CephMonitors is a collection of Ceph monitors

FSType.description: Filesystem type to mount. Must be a filesystem type supported by the host operating system. Ex. "ext4", "xfs", "ntfs". Implicitly inferred to be "ext4" if unspecified.

Keyring.description: Optional: Keyring is the path to key ring for RBDUser, default is /etc/ceph/keyring

RBDImage.description: Required: RBDImage is the rados image name

RBDPool.description: Optional: RadosPool is the rados pool name,default is rbd

RadosUser.description: Optional: RBDUser is the rados user name, default is admin

ReadOnly.description: Optional: Defaults to false (read/write). ReadOnly here will force the ReadOnly setting in VolumeMounts.

SecretRef.description: Optional: SecretRef is name of the authentication secret for RBDUser, default is nil.
